sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Button, Image, Space } from 'antd'
import { useImage } from '../context/latestInspectionImageContext'
import { SectorPicker } from './sectorPicker'

export const ImageContainer: React.FC = () => {
  const context = useImage()
  return <>
    {
      context.latestImage !== undefined
        ? <>
          <Space>
            <Button>Предыдущий сектор</Button>
            <Image src={context.latestImage.href} />
            <Button>Следующий сектор</Button>
          </Space>
        </>
        : <SectorPicker/>        
    }
  </>
}
